title: Plasticizers: distribution and impact in aquatic and terrestrial environments
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00317A, Critical Review
Danushika C. Manatunga, Madushika Sewwandi, Kalani Imalka Perera, Methmini Dilhara Jayarathna, Dinusha L. Peramune, Rohan S. Dassanayake, Sammani Ramanayaka, Meththika Vithanage
